meanings.definition: The quality or state of being stupendous; immense size or greatness.
meanings.sent1: The stupendousness of the mountain took my breath away.
meanings.sent2: The circus performance was filled with stupendousness.
meanings.sent3: The cake's stupendousness made everyone at the party smile.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness had a stupendousness that warmed the hearts of all who knew her.
meanings.sent5: The fireworks display was a display of stupendousness that lit up the night sky.

meanings.definition: An instance of being stupendous; a remarkable or extraordinary event.
meanings.sent1: The discovery of a new species was a stupendousness in the scientific community.
meanings.sent2: The concert was a stupendousness that will be remembered for years to come.
meanings.sent3: The cat's ability to balance on a ball was a stupendousness that amused the children.
meanings.sent4: The storm's fury was a stupendousness that shook the entire town.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's victory was a stupendousness that inspired many to pursue their dreams.
